summary: The story of "The Tolpuddle Martyrs". A group of nineteenth century English farm laborers who formed one of the first trade unions and started a campaign to receive fair wages.
cast: Keith Allen|Dave Atkins|Stephen Bateman|Katy Behean|Shane Briant|Mark Brown|Michael Clark|Lynette Curran|Joanna David|Phil Davis|Arthur Dignam|Patrick Field|Jeremy Flynn|James Fox|William Gaminara|John Hargreaves|Michael Hordern|Freddie Jones|John Lee|Alex McCrindle|Murray Melvin|Alex Norton|Vanessa Redgrave|Robin Soans|Imelda Staunton|Robert Stephens|Malcolm Terris|Sandra Voe|Valerie Whittington|Barbara Windsor|Colette Barker|Ralph Cotterill|Brian McDermott|Steve McGrath|Symon Parsonage
title: Camaradas
